plot: The story of Tom; a young boy growing up in Working Class England and how he deals with a violent father, and a mother who doesn't care.
title: It's Better Now
plot_es: The story of Tom; a young boy growing up in Working Class England and how he deals with a violent father, and a mother who doesn't care.
plot_en: The story of Tom; a young boy growing up in Working Class England and how he deals with a violent father, and a mother who doesn't care.
